titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD COMPLETED BY ADMITTED PATIENT IN LAST 7 DAYS (NOT WITHIN 18 WEEKS) (Retired) - Description

p.b: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

body.p: The last live version of this item is available in the November 2013 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

p.b: Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
